alert.note: Alert for Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Linn (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 11:21PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Buchanan, northwestern Johnson, Benton, northwestern Delaware, western Linn and northern Iowa Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1120 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tripoli to 6 miles southwest of Tama. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cedar Rapids, Independence, Vinton, Marengo, Hiawatha, Robins, Belle Plaine, Jesup, Center Point, Fairfax, Atkins, Walford, Urbana, Dysart, Fairbank, Palo, Shellsburg, Victor, Newhall and Winthrop. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 205 and 211. Interstate 380 between mile markers 27 and 55. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CDT for northeastern and east central Iowa.

area.areaDesc: Benton; Buchanan; Delaware; Iowa; Johnson; Linn
